SELECT id AS `key`, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(CONCAT_WS(' ',first_name, last_name)))<1 THEN NULL ELSE trim(CONCAT_WS(' ',first_name, last_name)) END AS name, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(description))<10 THEN NULL ELSE description END AS description, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(position))<2 THEN NULL ELSE position END AS position, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(email))<5 THEN null ELSE email END AS email, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(phone))<5 THEN null ELSE phone END AS phone, NULL AS organization, CASE WHEN char_length (trim(address))<1 THEN NULL ELSE address END AS address, CASE WHEN char_length (trim(city))<1 THEN NULL ELSE city END AS city, CASE WHEN char_length (trim(province))<1 THEN NULL ELSE province END AS province, CASE WHEN char_length (trim(country))<1 THEN NULL ELSE country END AS country, NULL AS postal_code, created, CASE WHEN modified IS NULL THEN NOW() ELSE modified END AS modified FROM contact WHERE deleted IS NULL
INSERT INTO contact(key,name,description,position,email,phone,organization,address,city,province,country,postal_code, created_by,modified_by,created,modified) VALUES(?key,?name,?description,?position,?email,?phone,?organization,?address,?city,?province,?country,?postal_code, ?{"ADMIN"},?{"ADMIN"},?created,?modified);
